system.description: This spell functions like mass cure light wounds, except that it cures 2d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +30) in each selected creature. Like other cure spells, mass cure moderate wounds deals damage to undead in its area rather than curing them.
system.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
system.savingThrow: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
